locations.title: In-Shape Fitness
locations.content: In-Shape Fitness may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … with strategically placed equipment, pool, sauna, cooling room, massage, outside gym area, green area for HIT exercises, and full shower and bath. Sure, it’s not California, but that’s the point. For what you pay here at In-Shape and what …

… own hair dryer. Absolut nonsense. You can't take a shower or use the pool if you have long hair during the winter basically. I am not even saying that everybody always steps in the sauna in sweaty clothes making it stink. Trash. Will close …

Helpful staff - and they keep the place clean. A good selection of equipment, recently renovated locker & shower facilities. Why not 5 stars? Sometimes the exercise rooms are very crowded during dinner hours, and the aerobic equipment room …

… /removals are not researched before they are installed/removed. Club dues are also raised without warning. Some of the lockers in the locker rooms are unusable due to the locks not being set right, and the shower stalls are not kept clean.
Friendly workers, good supplies; but the shower heads provide tiny flow of water compared with other gyms, the steam room rarely works, and the tiles fell off in the men's hot tub.

showerReviews.reviewText: DISGUSTING!!! I recently joined this club because it has showers and a set of saunas (wet/ dry).I went into the wet/ steam sauna and there were empty water bottles on the floor, as well as tissue paper. The sauna CLEARLY hadn't been cleaned …
… This is not a clean gym.They need to clean equipment, main gym and locker rooms very bad.  Hot water and soap would be nice for showers and fix  the handicapped shower. …

… say that I would not pay for a membership here. This place is filthy every time! The locker room, showers, and bathrooms are gross. There's always mud from shoes and trash on the floor. A few of the hand dryers don't work. My friend has …

This facility is disgusting. There are 2 shower's in the men's locker room that has mold growing on the wall's and 5 inch thick mold growing in the steam room. As much as I attend this gym and see at least 5 workers up front doing nothing. …

… them. But I have never had trouble finding a cardio machine and the SD auna is always hot. Would I shower here? Never, but I refuse to shower at 24 hr fitness or public gyms unless I know that they bleach the showers daily. Those gyms …
Broken machines, unfriendly staff, non attentive staff, dirty shower area... I really don't know why I'm paying my membership anymore.
